author: Kate Mayberry
title: UK PM in intensive care, Europe virus cases slow: Live updates
description: Boris Johnson was transferred to specialist unit on Monday night with Dominic Raab now leading the outbreak response.
content:
British Prime Minister Boris Johnson, who was diagnosed with coronavirus on March 26, is in intensive care in a London hospital after his condition worsened on Monday evening.
Foreign secretary Dominic Raab will be leading the UK government response to the c… [+3359 chars]
